Name: OSDisk
SummaryComment: Settings for the operating system disk of the compute node (VM).

Key.Name: EphemeralOSDiskSettings
Key.SummaryComment: Specifies the ephemeral Disk Settings for the operating system disk used by the compute node (VM).

Key.Name: Caching
Key.SummaryComment: Specifies the caching requirements. Possible values are: None, ReadOnly, ReadWrite. The default values are: None for Standard storage. ReadOnly for Premium storage.

Key.Name: DiskSizeGB
Key.SummaryComment: The initial disk size in GB when creating new OS disk.

Key.Name: WriteAcceleratorEnabled
Key.SummaryComment: Specifies whether writeAccelerator should be enabled or disabled on the disk.
